main.name: Ahmad Faisal Ridwan
main.description: I am a Fullstack Web Developer
main.bio: Experienced Application Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in PHP (Codeigniter and Laravel), and Python. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Informatics Engineering from UIN Syarif Hidayatullah Jakarta.
main.contactMessage: If you have any questions or want to work together, please don't hesitate to contact me.

education.description: I graduated from UIN Syarif Hidayatullah Jakarta with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science (S.Kom), completing my studies in October 2018. During my time at the Faculty of Science and Technology, majoring in Computer Engineering, I demonstrated a high level of dedication in studying the field of information technology. I possess strong programming and problem-solving skills, as well as a deep interest in software and application development. Additionally, I am known as a proactive and collaborative individual, ready to contribute in dynamic and innovative work environments.

education.school: CCIT Faculty of Engineering University of Indonesia
education.degree: Proferssional Programme of Sharia Banking Information Technology
education.description: I Completed the Professional Programme in Sharia Banking Information Technology at the CCIT Faculty of Engineering, Universitas Indonesia, graduating in October 2015. During his time here, I gained knowledge about information technology, including networking technology and software development.

The system's quality check applied layered checks starting from QA to pentest.
